title.narrative: Support to Private Sector Development Programme, phase III (SPSD III)
Increase in income (disaggregated by formal/informal, men/women, youth/non-youth, urban/rural and sectors)

description.narrative:
Indicator 2: Increase in income (disaggregated by formal/informal, men/women, youth/non- youth, urban/rural and sectors)
The target for this impact indicator is that by 2020: There should be a 15% increase in income for businesses supported by the SPSD III

title.narrative: Reduction in Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions, and increased adoption of clean technologies to improve sustainable energy access and energy efficiency.

description.narrative:
Indicator 3: Reduction in Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions, and increased adoption of clean technologies to improve sustainable energy access and energy efficiency.
By 2020; (a) 3,172 tonnes of CO2 mitigated (b) 25,000 people provided with cleaner energy and improved/cleaner

title.narrative: Occupational safety and health conditions improved in supported enterprises

description.narrative:
Indicator 4: Occupational safety and health conditions improved in supported enterprises.
The target is that by the end of 2020:
(a) 80% of supported formal sector enterprises are complying with national safety and health regulations; (b) 70% of employees of supported enterprises report that they have experienced improvement of the work environment
